name: Undulations
description:
This is a survival escape action game from a huge wave that will make you feel fear and despair within the first minute.

The setting is an exoplanet where waves of over 3,000 feet (about 900 meters) are constantly hitting the surface of the planet, due to the gravity of a giant red dwarf star and its orbital period of about 60 minutes.
The objective of the player is to escape from the waves and survive.

This game is an escape game, but there are no complicated puzzle elements; all you need is the courage and strength to overcome fear.

Overcoming this fear, thinking and acting in order to survive, continuing to challenge without giving up, and the scenery you see after surviving will surely leave a strong impression on the minds of those who play the game.
